tool_description: Extract fulltext, author, date etc. from an url containing a news article
name: News Article Extraction
title: News Article Extraction

api_list.name: Extract News Article
api_list.description: Extract structured content from a news article
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
